codes.name: fatal error - command execution
codes.devMsg: This error originates from the final try-catch around the command execution in the message.js event
codes.userMsg: Something went wrong trying to execute a command but no extra details were provided

codes.name: perms error - kick user
codes.devMsg: This error originates from the try-catch around the user kick in the kick.js command
codes.userMsg: An error occurred when attempting to kick a user

codes.name: database error - get guild for preferences
codes.devMsg: This error originates from the no docs if statement in an attempt to recieve the preferences in the message.js event
codes.userMsg: The guild could not be found in the database

codes.name: api error - meme
codes.devMsg: This error originates from the .catch() on the randomPuppy request to a sub-reddit in the meme.js command
codes.userMsg: an internal http request failed when searching for a meme on reddit
